TopicTitle: What am I missing? Kerbal Manager and moving crew from one docked craft to the other?

Articles.Content:
I've just docked my Lander Can to my Return Craft and cannot get Kerbal Manager to let me transfer crew from one pod to the other.

Shouldn't I be able to do this?

I'm not afraid to EVA the Kerbal from the Mun Lander to the Return Lander - but... shouldn't this work?
